com.ebay.sdk
Class ApiException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          com.ebay.sdk.SdkException
              com.ebay.sdk.ApiException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ApiException
extends SdkException

Represents one or more errors reported by an API call. Note that an API call can also return warnings, which do not trigger an ApiException.

Title:

Description:
